# Digipaja - Modern Web Development from Oulu, Finland

> Digipaja builds fast, modern, and SEO-optimized websites for Finnish businesses using Next.js, React, and Sanity CMS.

## About Us

Digipaja is a web development agency based in Oulu, Finland. We specialize in creating high-performance websites that look great and rank well in search engines.

**Founders:** Two brothers from Oulu who are passionate about modern web technologies.

**Location:** Oulu, Finland  
**Website:** https://digipajaoulu.fi  
**Languages:** Finnish, English

## Our Services

### 1. Website Development
We build modern, responsive websites using Next.js and React. Our sites are optimized for speed, accessibility, and SEO.

### 2. E-commerce Solutions
Custom online stores with secure payment processing, inventory management, and seamless user experience.

### 3. Content Management (CMS)
We use Sanity CMS to give you full control over your website content without technical knowledge.

### 4. SEO Optimization
Search engine optimization built into every project - from technical SEO to content strategy.

### 5. Maintenance & Support
Ongoing support, updates, and hosting to keep your website running smoothly.

## Technology Stack

- **Frontend:** Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **CMS:** Sanity
- **Hosting:** Vercel
- **Animations:** GSAP
- **Internationalization:** next-intl (Finnish & English)

## Pricing Packages

1. **Startti (Starter)** - Quick landing page for new businesses
2. **Kasvu (Growth)** - Professional multi-page website with CMS
3. **Pro** - Full digital solution with e-commerce and custom features

## Contact

For inquiries about web development projects, please visit: https://digipajaoulu.fi/fi/yhteydenotto

## Key Facts

- Based in Oulu, Finland
- Specializes in Next.js and React development
- All projects include SEO optimization
- Bilingual service (Finnish/English)
- Fast delivery times
- Modern, performance-focused approach
